Antminer S21 произведен компанией Bitmain. Работает на алгоритме Scrypt, обеспечивая максимальный хэшрейт 17,6 Гбит/с при энергопотреблении всего 3260 Вт.

Описание и особенности
Обзор на Antminer S21
Manufacturer Bitmain
Model Antminer S21 Pro 234Th/s
Release date July 2024
Size w/o 400 X 195 X 290mm
Size with 570 X 316 X 430mm
Weight Net 15400g
Weight Gross 17200g
Noise level 75 db
Fan(s) 4
Power 3510 W
Voltage 220-277
Interface Ethernet
Storage Temp. -20-70
Temperature 0 - 45 °C
Humidity 10-90%
J/TH 3

Manufacturer Bitmain occupies one of the very first positions in the market for the production of mining equipment. The equipment has a very good price/quality ratio and is a leader in its field.


3 Phase AntPDU For Antminer S21/T21 is a power distribution unit designed for use with Antminer S21, T21 and other models. It provides stable and efficient power to your equipment with 86000W of power and 12 6-pin PCI-E connectors and 1 4-pin CPU connector.


The power supply has compact dimensions (width 30 cm, height 20 cm) and light weight (only 0.1 kg), which makes it convenient for transportation and installation. The power supply input voltage is 346-480 VAC and the frequency is 50/60 Hz.


AntPDU For Antminer S21/T21 is made of quality materials and meets safety standards. It ensures reliable and durable operation of your equipment, allowing you to get the maximum return on your mining investment.
